name: fire-stone
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into flareon, a growlithe into arcanine, a pansear into simisear, or a vulpix into ninetales.
short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Flareon, a Growlithe into Arcanine, a Pansear into Simisear, or a Vulpix into Ninetales.
